site_name: 14A Park RoadKingston Upon ThamesKT2 6BG
description: Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 17/12997/FUL (Demolition of existing site buildings comprising vehicle repair workshop and offices and redevelopment to provide a 3-storey mixed-use building comprising ground floor B1 office space and 9 residential units (2 x 1 beds, 4 x 2 bed and 3 x 3 bed), along with communal amenity space, landscaping and undercroft parking and cycle parking (retaining frontage building at 14 Park Road): additional details and information) dated 28/06/2018. Amendment to consist of insertion of a small opening rooflight above eye level on upper level of Unit 8
